# ğŸ“„ Description

### What is this project? ğŸ“

- This is a project made with React and Typescript, it is a food commerce, where you can add products to the cart and see the total price of the products.

# ğŸš€ Technologies

This project was developed with the following technologies:

### ReactJS ğŸ“

### TypeScript ğŸ“

### json-server ğŸ“

### Axios ğŸ“

### Styled Components ğŸ“

### Polished ğŸ“

### React Icons ğŸ“

### React Router Dom ğŸ“

### React Toastify ğŸ“

### React Hooks ğŸ“

### React Context API ğŸ“

### Normalize ğŸ“

How to run:

```bash

# Clone Repository

$ git clone

# Go to folder

$ cd food-commerce

# Run Application

$ npm start / yarn start


Go to http://localhost:3000/ to see the result.

```
